timeline.raw_data: {"type": "email", "timestamp": "2025-07-27T09:16:00", "sender_email": "arifmohammed2105@gmail.com", "recipient_email": "rishabh.m@amberstudent.com", "subject": "Re: Hi Arif, amber is here to help you book your ideal student home in London! Let's go!", "message": "i wanted maximum of 350 gbp per week. This is my maximum.\\n\\nOn Sun, Jul 27, 2025 at 10:31\u202fAM <[rishabh.m@amberstudent.com]()> wrote:\\n\\nHi Arif,\\n\\nWe hope this email finds you well. We recently sent you an email with property suggestions for your student accommodation booking based on details provided by you. As we haven't received your response yet, we wanted to kindly remind you to make your Student Accommodation Selection.\\n\\nIf you have any questions or need further assistance, please don't hesitate to reach out to us via Call / Email / Whatsapp or let us know a suitable time to contact you. We look forward to your response and the opportunity to assist you further.\\n\\nNote: Please ignore if already in touch.\\n\\nKind regards,\\n\\n[amberstudent.com]\\n\\nRishabh M\\n\\nSenior Operation Associate\\n\\nPhone: [+447460047271]()\\n\\nWhatsapp: [+447460047271]()\\n\\nEmail: [rishabh.m@amberstudent.com]()\\n\\nWebsite: [amberstudent.com]()", "snippet": "i wanted maximum of 350 gbp per week. This is my maximum. On Sun, Jul 27, 2025 at 10:31 AM <rishabh.m@amberstudent.com> wrote: Hi Arif, We hope this email finds you well. We recently sent you an", "direction": "inbound", "sender_type": "student", "agent_email": "rishabh.m@amberstudent.com", "student_email": "arifmohammed2105@gmail.com"}

transcripts.transcript_text: Speaker A: Hello? Yeah, I'm speaking at Arif here. Yeah, hello, Arif Fresh of the site calling you from Amber Student. Pardon? Arifresh of the site calling you from Ambassador Student. Ah, yes. Okay. Arif just wanted to confirm if you have finalized the property for your London accommodation. Not yet as of now. Not yet at the moment. Yeah. So do you have any recommendation like which kind of property that you want so that I can check if this can be done nearby Bloomsbury? Nearby Bloomsbury. And what's the budget that you'll be looking for? Around three and 300. Around 300 per week? Yeah, maximum. Maximum. So I'll do one thing. If I'll check with my team and share you all the available option that we have and the 300 wind of pain and the moving date will be September, correct? Yeah. Okay, so I'll share it to you on WhatsApp. How about that? Yeah, sure. Okay. Okay, thank you. Bye bye. Thank you.

Speaker A: Hello. Yeah, hello, am I speaking with RF here? Yes, Arif Rishabh, the site calling you from Amber Student. From Amber Student. RF this call is regarding your student accommodation.
Speaker B: Okay.
Speaker A: Just wanted to confirm if you have decided anything with the options. Now.
Speaker B: I haven't looked through them actually.
Speaker A: Can you please repeat that once again?
Speaker B: Yeah, I haven't looked through them actually. So can you like resend the email?
Speaker A: Yeah, sure I can. That's not an issue. I will do that. Okay.
Speaker B: Okay. Okay.
Speaker A: Okay.
Speaker B: Thank you.
